content:
From: Elsa L Gunter <egunter@cs.uiuc.edu>
Wanting to check out some of the recent changes with Isabelle, I
downloaded the development snapshop from today
(Isabelle_30_Jun_2006.tar.gz) and built it using SMJ-NJ v 110.59 on a
Mac PowerBook G4 running OS X 10.4.6. I left ProofGeneral and Xemacs
alone, particularly seeing as they seem to be the most recent releases
anyway. When I try tp start up Isabelle inside ProofGeneral inside
Xemacs, either by loading a .thy file in Xemacs, or by running Isabelle,
I get the following error message:

File mode specification error: (args-out-of-range "" 0 -1)

and Isabelle fails to load. Does anybody have any idea what the root of
my problem is?
---Elsa
